Plot: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.
Title: National Lampoon's Vacation
Actors: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Imogene Coca, Randy Quaid
tomatoConsensus: Blessed by a brilliantly befuddled star turn from Chevy Chase, National Lampoon's Vacation is one of the more consistent -- and thoroughly quotable -- screwball comedies of the 1980s.
